file.title: Admin Tools
file.description: Defines the list of admin tools available

file.title: Analytics Dashboard Configuration
file.description: Defines types of reports shown on Analytics Dashboard

file.title: Contextual Navigation Configuration
file.description: Defines modules on the site contextual navigation bar

file.title: Site Dropdown Configuration
file.description: Defines modules on the site dropdown bar

file.title: Endpoints Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of end points available

file.title: Targets Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of targets used for form datasource

file.title: RTE Configuration
file.description: Defines Rich Text Editors configurations in form

file.title: Preview Asset Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of editable assets associated with XML contents

file.title: Preview Components Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of components that can be created dynamically in preview

file.title: Preview Panel Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of tools available in preview

file.title: Personas Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of personas available to assume in preview

file.title: Notification Configuration
file.description: Defines a list of UI messages

file.title: Permissions Mappings
file.description: Defines a map of permissions and paths

file.title: Role Mappings
file.description: Defines a list of roles available in site

file.title: Workflow Configuration
file.description: Defines workflows available in the system
